mapper.insert: insert into ST_GATE_B (STCD, EQPNO, Name, GateType, GateRemark, CameraID) values (#{STCD,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{EQPNO,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{gateType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{gateRemark,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{cameraID,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select STCD, EQPNO, Name, GateType, GateRemark, CameraID from ST_GATE_B
